mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(DAIO_IODate ,'YYYY-MM-DD') as DAIO_IODate, DAIO_Place, JJR_DocNo, nvl(JJJ_DocNo, ' ') as JJJ_DocNo, TO_CHAR(JJR_RCDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as JJR_RCDate, TO_CHAR(JJJ_SDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as JJJ_SDate, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name(300, 300, JJJ_JRType) as JJJ_JRType , MAI_TeamNo, MAC_ENAME, TO_CHAR(MAI_BIRTHDAY,'YYYY-MM-DD') as MAI_BIRTHDAY, fn_getDptName(MAI_TeamNo) as DptName , MAI_VvrmNo, fn_getVvrmName(MAI_VvrmNo) as VvrmName, BAA_AniCode, MAC_Name, MAI_BNAME, MAI_Sex, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name(200, 202, MAI_Sex) as MAI_GENDER, nvl(JJJ_JRDzzName, ' ') as JJJ_JRDzzName , nvl(JJJ_JRCmnt, ' ') as JJJ_JRCmnt, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name('300', '302', nvl(JJJ_JRSts, ' ')) as JRStsName , JJR_Cmnt, JJR_JRType, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name('300', '300', nvl(JJR_JRType, ' ')) as JrTypeName, JJJ_JRDzzType, JJJ_Insu, JJJ_ReqOrga, TO_CHAR(JJJ_EDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as JJJ_EDate, JJJ_JRSts, JJJ_SUserID, JJJ_EUserID, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name('300', '303', nvl(JJJ_JRDzzType, ' ')) as JRDzzTypeName FROM JN_JINRYO_RC left join JN_JINRYO_JNL on JJJ_RCNo = JJR_DocNo , MF_ANI_CLS, MF_ANI_INFO, BZ_ANI_ATCH, DT_ANI_IO WHERE MAI_AniClsCode = MAC_AniClsCode AND MAI_AniCode = BAA_AniCode AND JJR_DocNo = BAA_DocNo AND daio_anicode = baa_anicode AND DAIO_IOType = '1' AND JJJ_DOCNO = #{JJJ_DOCNO} ORDER BY JJR_RCDate, JJJ_DocNo

select Rownum as RNUM, MBI_BdInspCode, MCC_S_NAME, MCC_COM_S1, MBI_Mean, MBI_StdDevi, nvl(JJDKBL_Rslt, 0.0) as JJDKBL_Rslt, nvl(JJDKBL_Cmnt, '') as JJDKBL_Cmnt, TO_CHAR(JJDKBL_KSDate ,'YYYY-MM-DD') as JJDKBL_KSDate, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name('500', '500', JJDKBL_KSTYPE) as JJDKBL_KSTYPE from MF_COMM_CODE, MF_BDINSP_ITEM left join JN_JINRYO_DATE_KBL on MBI_BdInspCode = JJDKBL_Item and JJDKBL_Item = MBI_BdInspCode and JJDKBL_KSType = '1' and JJDKBL_DocNo = #{JJDKY_DOCNO} where MCC_L_CODE = '500' and MCC_M_CODE = '502' and MCC_S_CODE = MBI_BdInspCode and MBI_AniClsCode = #{MBI_ANICLSCODE}

SELECT Rownum as RNUM, JJDKY_DOCNO, JJJ_DOCNO, JJJ_JRDZZNAME, JJJ_JRCMNT, MAC_NAME,MAI_BNAME , MAC_ENAME, MAI_ANICODE, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name(200, 202, MAI_Sex) as MAI_GENDER, TO_CHAR(JJDKY_KSDATEYY,'YYYY-MM-DD') as JJDKY_KSDATEYY, fn_getVvrmName(MAI_VvrmNo) as VvrmName, DAIO_Place , TO_CHAR(MAI_BIRTHDAY,'YYYY-MM-DD') as MAI_BIRTHDAY, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name(500, 500, JJDKY_KSType) as JJDKY_KSType, FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE,TO_CHAR(MAI_Birthday,'YYYY-MM-DD'))/12)AS AGE, FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN( SYSDATE, TO_CHAR(MAI_Birthday,'YYYY-MM-DD'))) - FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN( SYSDATE, TO_CHAR(MAI_Birthday,'YYYY-MM-DD')) / 12 ) * 12 as AGE2, JJDKSK_WAY, JJDKSK_PART, JJDKSK_RSLT FROM jn_jinryo_date_ksk, JN_JINRYO_DATE_KY, JN_JINRYO_JNL,BZ_ANI_ATCH, MF_ANI_CLS, MF_ANI_INFO left join ( select DAIO_AniCode, DAIO_IOType, DAIO_IODate, DAIO_Place from DT_ANI_IO WHERE DAIO_IOType = '1' and rownum <=1 order by DAIO_IODate desc ) IOInf on DAIO_AniCode = MAI_AniCode WHERE JJJ_DOCNO = JJDKY_JRNO AND JJJ_RCNO = BAA_DOCNO AND MAI_AniClsCode = MAC_AniClsCode AND MAI_AniCode = BAA_AniCode AND JJDKSK_DOCNO = JJDKY_DOCNO AND JJJ_DOCNO = #{JJJ_DOCNO} AND JJDKY_DOCNO = #{JJDKY_DOCNO}

SELECT Rownum as RNUM, JJDKY_DOCNO, JJJ_DOCNO, JJJ_JRDZZNAME, JJJ_JRCMNT, MAC_NAME,MAI_BNAME , MAC_ENAME, MAI_ANICODE, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name(200, 202, MAI_Sex) as MAI_GENDER, TO_CHAR(JJDKY_KSDATEYY,'YYYY-MM-DD') as JJDKY_KSDATEYY, fn_getVvrmName(MAI_VvrmNo) as VvrmName, DAIO_Place , TO_CHAR(MAI_BIRTHDAY,'YYYY-MM-DD') as MAI_BIRTHDAY, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name(500, 500, JJDKY_KSType) as JJDKY_KSType, FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE,TO_CHAR(MAI_Birthday,'YYYY-MM-DD'))/12)AS AGE, FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN( SYSDATE, TO_CHAR(MAI_Birthday,'YYYY-MM-DD'))) - FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN( SYSDATE, TO_CHAR(MAI_Birthday,'YYYY-MM-DD')) / 12 ) * 12 as AGE2, JJDKJK_WAY, JJDKJK_PART, JJDKJK_RSLT FROM jn_jinryo_date_kjk, JN_JINRYO_DATE_KY, JN_JINRYO_JNL,BZ_ANI_ATCH, MF_ANI_CLS, MF_ANI_INFO left join ( select DAIO_AniCode, DAIO_IOType, DAIO_IODate, DAIO_Place from DT_ANI_IO WHERE DAIO_IOType = '1' and rownum <=1 order by DAIO_IODate desc ) IOInf on DAIO_AniCode = MAI_AniCode WHERE JJJ_DOCNO = JJDKY_JRNO AND JJJ_RCNO = BAA_DOCNO AND MAI_AniClsCode = MAC_AniClsCode AND MAI_AniCode = BAA_AniCode AND JJDKJK_DOCNO = JJDKY_DOCNO AND JJJ_DOCNO = #{JJJ_DOCNO} AND JJDKJK_DOCNO = #{JJDKY_DOCNO}

select JJR_DocNo, JJJ_DocNo, TO_CHAR(JJR_RCDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as JJR_RCDate, TO_CHAR(JJJ_SDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as JJJ_SDate , nvl(JJJ_JRType, '') as JJJ_JRType, MAI_TeamNo, fn_getDptName(MAI_TeamNo) as DptName, MAI_VvrmNo, fn_getVvrmName(MAI_VvrmNo) as VvrmName, BAA_AniCode, MAC_Name, MAI_BName, MAC_ENAME, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name(200, 202, MAI_SEX) as MAI_GENDER, nvl(JJJ_JRDzzName, ' ') as JJJ_JRDzzName, nvl(JJJ_JRCmnt, ' ') as JJJ_JRCmnt, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name('300', '302', nvl(JJJ_JRSts, ' ')) as JRStsName, JJR_Cmnt, JJR_JRType, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name('300', '300', nvl(JJR_JRType, ' ')) as JrTypeName, JJJ_JRDzzType, JJJ_Insu, JJJ_ReqOrga, TO_CHAR(JJJ_EDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as JJJ_EDate, JJJ_JRSts, JJJ_SUserID, JJJ_EUserID, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name('300', '303', nvl(JJJ_JRDzzType, ' ')) as JRDzzTypeName,TO_CHAR(MAI_Birthday,'YYYY-MM-DD') as MAI_Birthday, FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE,TO_CHAR(MAI_Birthday,'YYYY-MM-DD'))/12)AS AGE, FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN( SYSDATE, TO_CHAR(MAI_Birthday,'YYYY-MM-DD'))) - FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN( SYSDATE, TO_CHAR(MAI_Birthday,'YYYY-MM-DD')) / 12 ) * 12 as AGE2 FROM JN_JINRYO_RC left join JN_JINRYO_JNL on JJJ_RCNo = JJR_DocNo, MF_ANI_CLS, MF_ANI_INFO, BZ_ANI_ATCH where MAI_AniClsCode = MAC_AniClsCode and MAI_AniCode = BAA_AniCode and JJR_DocNo = BAA_DocNo and JJJ_RCNO = #{JJJ_RCNO} and JJJ_DOCNO = #{JJJ_DOCNO}
